com.robopupu.api.feature

Interface FeatureManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Manager, PluginComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFeatureManager

    public interface FeatureManager
extends Manager
    FeatureManager defines an interface for Manager object that provides an API for managing Features.

    • Method Summary

      • createFeature

        Feature createFeature(java.lang.Class<? extends Feature> featureClass)
        Creates the specified Feature, but does not start it. If the feature is a DependencyScopeOwner its DependencyScope is added to cache of DependencyScopes.
        Parameters:
        featureClass - A Feature
        Returns:
        A Feature.

      • startFeature

        Feature startFeature(FeatureContainer featureContainer,
                     java.lang.Class<? extends Feature> featureClass)
        Creates and starts the specified Feature whose FeatureFragments are hosted by the given FeatureContainer.
        Parameters:
        featureContainer - A FeatureContainer.
        featureClass - A Class specifying the Feature to be created and started.
        Returns:
        A Feature.

      • startFeature

        Feature startFeature(FeatureContainer featureContainer,
                     java.lang.Class<? extends Feature> featureClass,
                     Params params)
        Creates and starts the specified Feature whose FeatureFragments are hosted by the given FeatureContainer.
        Parameters:
        featureContainer - A FeatureContainer.
        featureClass - A Class specifying the Feature to be created and started.
        params - A Params containing parameters for the created and started Feature.
        Returns:
        A Feature.

      • startFeature

        Feature startFeature(FeatureContainer featureContainer,
                     Feature feature)
        Starts the given Feature whose FeatureFragments are hosted by the given FeatureContainer.
        Parameters:
        featureContainer - A FeatureContainer.
        feature - {The Feature to be started.
        Returns:
        A Feature.

      • startFeature

        Feature startFeature(FeatureContainer featureContainer,
                     Feature feature,
                     Params params)
        Starts the given Feature whose FeatureFragments are hosted by the given FeatureContainer.
        Parameters:
        featureContainer - A FeatureContainer.
        feature - {The Feature to be started.
        params - A Params containing parameters for the started Feature.
        Returns:
        A Feature.

      • onBackPressed

        boolean onBackPressed()
        Invoked to handle Back Pressed event received by the FeatureContainer.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating if the event was consumed by this method.

      • onFeatureResumed

        void onFeatureResumed(Feature feature)
        Invoked by a PluginStateComponent.resume() when the Feature} has been resumed.
        Parameters:
        feature - A Feature. May not be null.

      • onFeaturePaused

        void onFeaturePaused(Feature feature,
                     boolean finishing)
        Invoked by a PluginStateComponent.pause() when the Feature} has been paused.
        Parameters:
        feature - A Feature. May not be null.
        finishing - A boolean value indicating if the PluginStateComponent is going to be finished i.e. it is not resumed nor restarted anymore.

      • onFeatureStopped

        void onFeatureStopped(Feature feature)
        Invoked by a PluginStateComponent.stop() when the Feature} has been stopped.
        Parameters:
        feature - A Feature. May not be null.

      • onFeatureDestroyed

        Invoked by a PluginStateComponent.destroy() when the Feature} has been destroyed.
        Parameters:
